___name.description: The name of the cluster resource

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.
The cluster resource properties

___fabricSettings.description: List of custom fabric settings to configure the cluster.

___managementEndpoint.description: The http management endpoint of the cluster

___upgradeMode.description: Cluster upgrade mode indicates if fabric upgrade is initiated automatically by the system or not.

___clientCertificateThumbprints.description: The client thumbprint details ,it is used for client access for cluster operation

___vmImage.description: The name of VM image VMSS has been configured with. Generic names such as Windows or Linux can be used.

___clusterCodeVersion.description: The ServiceFabric code version running in your cluster

___azureActiveDirectory.description: The settings to enable AAD authentication on the cluster

___nodeTypes.description: The list of node types that make up the cluster

___clientCertificateCommonNames.description: List of client certificates to whitelist based on common names

___reliabilityLevel.description: Cluster reliability level indicates replica set size of system service.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

ServiceFabric settings under sections
Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___parameters.description: Collection of settings in the section, each setting is a tuple consisting of setting name and value

___upgradeDomainTimeout.description: The timeout for any upgrade domain,it represents .Net TimeSpan

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___forceRestart.description: Force node to restart or not

___healthCheckStableDuration.description: The length of time that health checks must pass continuously,it represents .Net TimeSpan

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___overrideUserUpgradePolicy.description: Use the user defined upgrade policy or not

$eref.description: Delta health policy for the cluster

___maxPercentUpgradeDomainDeltaUnhealthy.description: Additional unhealthy nodes percentage per upgrade domain

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___deltaHealthPolicy.description: Delta health policy for the cluster

$eref.description: Defines a health policy used to evaluate the health of the cluster or of a cluster node.

___maxPercentUnhealthyNodes.description: The maximum allowed percentage of unhealthy nodes before reporting an error. For example, to allow 10% of nodes to be unhealthy, this value would be 10.

___maxPercentUnhealthyApplications.description: The maximum allowed percentage of unhealthy applications before reporting an error. For example, to allow 10% of applications to be unhealthy, this value would be 10.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___healthPolicy.description: Defines a health policy used to evaluate the health of the cluster or of a cluster node.

___healthCheckRetryTimeout.description: The length of time that health checks can fail continuously,it represents .Net TimeSpan

___upgradeReplicaSetCheckTimeout.description: Timeout for replica set upgrade to complete,it represents .Net TimeSpan

___healthCheckWaitDuration.description: The length of time to wait after completing an upgrade domain before performing health checks, it represents .Net TimeSpan

_88ClientCertificateCommonName.description: Client certificate details using common name

___certificateCommonName.description: Certificate common name to be granted access; be careful using wild card common names

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___isAdmin.description: Is this certificate used for admin access from the client, if false , it is used or query only access
